module.title: Info: Manual
module.description:
Viewer for documents written using Markdown.
Additionally contains editing features which need to be enabled.
Features of viewer: list> - Documents are existing as files and can be stored in (nested) folders - Markdown syntax can be rendered: list> - before delivery using serverside Markdown renderer (server-inline) - before display using AJAX and serverside Markdown renderer (server-ajax) - before display using PageDown.js (client) <list <list Features of editor: list> - Documents can be added, updated, renamed/moved or removed - Document list order can be managed by pushing documents up or down - Renaming a document will adjust links to this document in others <list This module can be localized.
